title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid email, password, and name, and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Enter valid email, password, and name
Submit registration form
Registration completes successfully with confirmation message
Verify user profile is created and data persisted

title: User Registration Failure for Missing Fields
description: Verify registration fails if required fields (email, password, or name) are missing.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Submit empty registration form
Display error messages requiring all mandatory fields

title: User Login Success
description: Verify user can login successfully with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid registered email and correct password
Click login button
User is logged in and redirected to dashboard

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails with an incorrect password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter registered email and incorrect password
Click login button
Login fails and error message about invalid credentials is displayed

title: Book Search by Title
description: Verify that searching by book title returns relevant results matching the query.

steps.description: Navigate to the main page
Enter book title keyword into search bar
Execute search
Search results display books with matching or similar titles

title: Book Search with Category Filter
description: Verify searching books by title combined with category filter returns filtered and relevant results.

steps.description: Enter book title keyword in search bar
Select a specific book category filter
Execute search
Results are limited to books within the selected category matching the query

title: Book Search Returns Empty for No Matches
description: Verify search returns empty results or appropriate message when no books match the query.

steps.description: Enter a random string or nonsense keyword into search bar
Execute search
Display message indicating no results found

title: Open Book in PDF Reader
description: Verify selecting a book opens the PDF reader with correct book content loaded.

steps.description: Select a book from search results or library
Open book for reading
PDF Reader interface loads with the selected book displayed

title: Reading Modes Switch
description: Validate user can toggle between single page, two-page, and full-screen reading modes.

steps.description: Open book in PDF reader
Switch to two-page mode
Display shows two pages side by side
Switch to full-screen mode
Reader enters full-screen with continuous view
Switch back to single page mode
Display shows single page as default

title: Page Navigation and Zoom Controls
description: Ensure user can navigate pages forward and backward and control zoom level effectively.

steps.description: Open book in PDF reader
Use page navigation controls to go to next page
Page updates to next page
Use zoom control to zoom in the page
Page zooms in appropriately without distortion
Use zoom control to zoom out
Page zooms out appropriately

title: Page Curl Animation and 3D CSS Effects
description: Verify the page-curl animation and 3D CSS effects activate properly during page turns and mode changes.

steps.description: Open book in PDF reader
Navigate page forward while observing page curling animation
Page curl animation plays smoothly with no visual glitches
Toggle reading modes to trigger 3D CSS effects
3D visual effects render correctly and enhance user experience

title: Text-to-Speech Functionality
description: Verify the text-to-speech feature correctly reads aloud the book content and can be paused, resumed, and stopped.

steps.description: Open a book in the PDF reader
Activate text-to-speech control
Book content is read aloud accurately
Pause text-to-speech
Reading audio pauses immediately
Resume text-to-speech
Reading audio resumes from the paused position
Stop text-to-speech
Reading audio stops completely

title: Reading Progress and Bookmark Saving
description: Verify reading progress and bookmarks are saved automatically and persist across sessions.

steps.description: Open a book and navigate to a specific page
Add a bookmark on the current page
Bookmark appears in user's personal library dashboard
Close and reopen the web application, then log in
Navigate to personal library dashboard
Previously saved reading progress and bookmarks are correctly restored

title: Manage Personal Reading Status Shelves
description: Verify user can categorize books into Plan to Read, Reading, On Hold, and Completed shelves, and changes persist.

steps.description: In personal library, select a book and assign it to 'Plan to Read'
Book appears in 'Plan to Read' shelf
Change book status to 'Reading'
Book moves to 'Reading' shelf
Change book status to 'On Hold'
Book moves to 'On Hold' shelf
Change book status to 'Completed'
Book moves to 'Completed' shelf

title: User Book Upload Success
description: Verify users can upload new books successfully and the books appear in the library for discovery.

steps.description: Navigate to book upload interface
Fill in required book metadata fields and upload book file
Submit book upload form
Upload completes without errors and confirmation message is shown
Search or browse library for the uploaded book
Uploaded book is available and visible in search results

title: Book Management: Update and Delete Operations
description: Verify users can edit and delete their uploaded books and changes propagate accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to user's uploaded book listing
Edit book details (e.g., title or description) and save changes
Book details update successfully and changes reflect in the library
Delete the uploaded book
Book is removed from user's uploads and library listings

title: Theme Toggle and Persistence
description: Verify toggling between light and dark themes updates the UI immediately and persists after page reload.

steps.description: Toggle theme switch to dark mode
UI updates immediately to dark theme
Reload the page
Dark theme persists after reload
Toggle theme switch to light mode
UI updates immediately to light theme
Reload the page
Light theme persists after reload

title: Background Music Playback and Track Selection
description: Verify that background music can be played, paused, stopped, and user can select different tracks without disrupting reading experience.

steps.description: Open a book in the reader interface
Start background music playback
Music plays in the background with controllable volume
Pause the music
Music playback pauses immediately
Select a different music track
New track starts playing without errors
Stop the music entirely
Music playback stops completely

title: Graceful Error Page Display on Network Failure
description: Verify that when the network connection is lost or API endpoints fail, graceful fallback error pages are presented without crashing the app.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or API failure during book search
Display graceful fallback error page with instructions to retry or check connection
Simulate network failure during book reading
Display fallback UI components and error message without app crash

title: Performance Benchmarks for Page Load and Search
description: Verify page load times and book search response times meet defined performance criteria under normal and high load.

steps.description: Load the home page and measure load time
Page load completes within acceptable threshold (e.g., under 2 seconds)
Perform a book search with a common query
Search results display within acceptable threshold (e.g., under 1 second)
Simulate high load via concurrent users performing searches and reading
System maintains responsive UI and search results within defined SLA
